title: 如何让PlayerPoints和CashCode全服兼容
author: CarbonPaper99
txt_content: 如题，SQL已经安装完毕，不知如何使用，望能回答

replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content: 把两个插件都连接数据库不就完了

replies.author: CarbonPaper99
replies.txt_content:
安装了。。。配置如下：
storage: MySQL
mysql:
  host: localhost
  port: 3306
  database: playerpoints
  user: root
  password: xxxxxx
  table: playerpoints
  import:
    use: false
    source: MySQL
  export:
    use: false
    source: MySQL
  retry: 10
vote:
  enabled: false
  amount: 100
  online: false
restrictions:
  autocompleteOnline: false
  hasPlayedBefore: false
debug:
  database: false
  uuid: false
vault: false
version: 2.1.5-SNAPSHOT

输入过后出现/p <param>怎么办？

replies.author: 恋
replies.txt_content: 数据库创建了吗  你需要在MySQL里面创建名为  playerpoints 的库

replies.author: 阿威23333
replies.txt_content:
